br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.rpg

Class RpgController

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.rpg.RpgController

  • public class RpgController
extends java.lang.Object
    Establishes the connection between the model (RpgPlatform) and the viewer (RpgScreen) of the RPG World. It gets the user input from the Viewer and send to the Model. Then, returns the processed data from Model to Viewer.

    • Method Detail

      • moveCharacter

        public void moveCharacter(Character.WalkDirection direction)
        Method called only from the Viewer. Sends the move command from input to the Model.

      • moveCharacter

        public void moveCharacter(Path path,
                 int[] destinationPos)
        Method called only from the Viewer. Sends the move command (in a designated path) from input to the Model and triggers an interactive event, if possible.
        Parameters:
        destinationPos - The destiny, in tiles (destinationPos[0] = x, destinationPos[1] = y).

      • updateModel

        public void updateModel()
        Method called by the Viewer to update the model (e.g., try clearing the character's movement buffer). It also checks for changes in direction.

      • runAutomaticEvents

        public void runAutomaticEvents()
        Method called by the Viewer to execute the automatic events of the map in the current object layer.

      • triggerEvent

        public void triggerEvent()
        Method called by the Viewer to send the trigger command to the model.

      • characterMoved

        public void characterMoved(Character.WalkDirection direction)
        Method called only from the Model. It sends a command to the Viewer to update the character sprite as the model's character moves.

      • getViewer

        public RpgScreen getViewer()

      • setViewer
